page.title: 15Education
page.content: difficult to know where the social centre of the village will be. The village does now have a priest-in-charge (the Rev. Peter Turner who is rector of four parishes); the owner of the Village Shop and Post Office at Fyfield, Mr. Wilkinson, takes his Post Office facilities to Willingale for a few hours on Tuesdays (in the village hall). But there will be no substitute for the school. The village has been very close. The Sixties Club has been entertained by the school and have returned the hospitality. Events are held in the village hall in addition to the regular clubs such as badminton. The library calls every Friday. Shopping is done over a wide area - Chelmsford, Fyfield, Ongar, Romford, Brentwood and Harlow.
